EmailTemplate.description: Created by Whitney Downer, 2/28/12. This email is sent following the webinar to thank them for joining as well as direct them to additional resources.
EmailTemplate.name: 27Apr12Web: Women.Thank you attending
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank You for Attending our Webinar on The Third Path!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=Consultant}},
Thank you for taking the time out of your busy schedule to attend our webinar "The Third Path: Independent Consulting for Entrepreneurial Women" moderated by our CMO, Aassia Haq. We hope you were able to gain some new insight into how women can find success in the world of independent consulting. To follow-up on the information provided on Friday, we wanted to share a few resources.
1. Presentation slides <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO-Partners-Webinar-The-Third-Path-Women-Independent-Consulting.pdf> 2. Recorded webinar <http://www.mbopartners.com/webinar-third-path-independent-consulting-entrepreneurial-women> 3. The Third Path Infographic <http://www.mbopartners.com/state-of-independence/women-and-independent-work.html> 4. State of Independence Workforce Index <http://www.mbopartners.com/state-of-independence/docs/MBO-Partners-Independent-Workforce-Index-2011.pdf> 5. "Are You Ready to go Solo?" Online Quiz <http://www.mbopartners.com/state-of-independence/are-you-ready-to-go-solo-quiz.html>
We invite you to sign-up <http://info.mbopartners.com/2012SeriesSignUp.html> to stay informed about future webinars in our series. If you have any topic recommendations or feedback, please email webinar@mbopartners.com.
Thank you,
MBO Partners
